extendedInfo.description: Combine magic balls to target request! This is an addictive yet very challenging brain game. You have to find proper magic balls by calculating by heart in a short time. The game rule is simple: # Select the same color of magic balls as the target ball. White target stands for any color.# The sum of selected magic balls should be equal to the target. No more, no less.# Finish the request before timer runs out. Tips to gain high score:# The MORE balls you select for one request, the more score you gain.# There is current SUM REMINDER below the target number.# Click as fast as possible in REWARD level.Enjoy the game, and see how smart you are!

reviews.title: Ok but....
reviews.comment: The ads are annoying. Cant let the kids play because the ads for playboy girls. Really...i kid you not.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: !The Greatest Math Fun Ever!
reviews.comment: This is a math fun work of art. I hope it stays free or updates Better more advanced tacticks like a variety of combo power moves with online combat. Psghhh its just dreams. ( message me if u want any ideas i am loaded!

reviews.title: Instructions makes no sense but fun
Very cool mind exercise...
reviews.comment: Brain-training made fun! (Like elementary school for big kids...and I\'m a 66-yr-old big kid! LOL

reviews.title: Almost addicting
reviews.comment: You keep wanting to play to get a better score. I can\'t believe how many times I get the color wrong. Geeze then I have to play again and again.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but need another failure outcome
reviews.comment: this game is good but when it comes to missing the goal, you always restart again.  my daughter found this frustrating.  if you fail, there should another outcome than the game ending for little kids.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Eh
reviews.comment: Its alright i guess.....could offer better directions on how to play the game.

reviews.title: Giovanni
reviews.comment: This game is so fun... its also very addictive...once you try it you can\'t leave it alone...I been playing since I downloaded it nonstop

reviews.title: Well done
reviews.comment: Looks good and fun to play. Would be 5 starts if there were other math properties like multiplication n whatnot. Well done though
